name: They Pile Up
description:
How long can you survive when corpses start to pile up and block your path? Slain enemies become an obstacle so you must destroy your opponents while still keeping yourself from being boxed in. Find powerups to help you survive.

Use controller as mouse aiming does not work atm.

Left Stick to move, Right Stick to aim, Right Trigger (R2) to attack, Right Bumber (R1) to use powerup.

Made for Pursuing Pixels James Jam Games Gam
